mapper.select: select group_concat(concat(jsh_material.name,' ',ifnull(jsh_material.standard,''),' ',ifnull(jsh_material.model,''))) as mName from jsh_depot_item left join jsh_material on jsh_depot_item.material_id = jsh_material.Id and ifnull(jsh_material.delete_Flag,'0') !='1' where jsh_depot_item.header_id = #{id} and ifnull(jsh_depot_item.delete_flag,'0') !='1'
select ifnull(sum(dh.deposit),0) from jsh_depot_head dh where dh.link_number=#{number} and ifnull(dh.delete_flag,'0') !='1'
